p: Studies on the effects of omega-3 PUFAs on microbiota have mainly focused on the major bacterial phyla Bacteroidetes and Firmicutes in animal models. Omega-3 PUFAs from flaxseed seem to decrease the proportion of Bacteroidetes [ 55], and those from fish oil appear to lower the population of Firmicutes [ 56]. An increase in the Firmicutes/ Bacteroidetes ratio has been linked to weight gain and other metabolic conditions, such as insulin resistance, in part by the synthesis of SCFAs.
